static void Utilities.Media.Image.Watermark ( string  FileName,
string  WatermarkFileName,
string  NewFileName,
float  Opacity,
int  X,
int  Y,
Color  KeyColor 
) [static]

Adds a watermark to an image.

Parameters:
FileName File of the image to add the watermark to
WatermarkFileName Watermark file name
NewFileName Location to save the resulting image
Opacity Opacity of the watermark (1.0 to 0.0 with 1 being completely visible and 0 being invisible)
X X position in pixels for the watermark
KeyColor Transparent color used in watermark image, set to null if not used
Y Y position in pixels for the watermark

Definition at line 550 of file Image.cs.

) [static]

Parameters:

Y Y position in pixels for the watermark
KeyColor Transparent color used in watermark image, set to null if not used
Returns:
